Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class PutBackMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.ChooseColorMessage
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.PutBackMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PutBackMessage extends ChooseColorMessage
The class PutBackMessage represent the action that put back in the bag some students (according the rule) of a color, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
See Also:

    execute(Game game)

  • Constructor Details

    • PutBackMessage

      public PutBackMessage(String sender, Color color)
      Is the constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      sender - is the sender of the Message, is a String that contain the nickname of the player
      color - is the color of the students to put back

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public Update execute(Game game) throws IllegalMoveException, NoActiveCardException
      The method execute is an override of the class Message, apply all the changes needed to the model through the game to put back the students in the bag, check if the character card is active
      Specified by:
      execute in class Message
      Parameters:
      game - is the object that represent the game and is used to modify the model
      Returns:
      an Update object to communicate the state of the game to the controller
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - is the exception thrown if the action is not permitted
      NoActiveCardException - is the exception thrown if there is no character card active
